message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on a fantastic product! I'm looking to sell it to you for $150.
I'm really interested in the product, but $150 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
I understand that $120 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we settle on $135?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $135 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $125 for the product. Can you consider that?
I'm not willing to go below $130, but I'm willing to make a compromise. How about we meet at $130?
I'm getting close to the price I'm willing to pay, but $130 is still a bit too high. I'm willing to pay $128 for the product. Can you meet me at that price?
I'm not willing to go below $130, but I'm willing to meet you at $129. That's the lowest I can go.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still not willing to pay $129. I'm willing to pay $128 for the product. This is my final offer.
I've already said I won't go below $129, and I'm not willing to budge further. I'm going to have to consider other options.
